sentences.en: ‘How long will she be ill?’ he asked. There was an ominous silence.
sentences.cn: “她的病多久会好？”他问。大家的沉默让人感觉不妙。

sentences.en: As chrysanthemum, rhododendron and walnut, such as an ominous thing.
sentences.cn: 视菊花 、 杜鹃花与核桃等为不祥之物.

sentences.en: Dr. Whipple and Captain Janders were already listening to the ominous sound.
sentences.cn: 惠普尔医生和詹德尔斯船上也已经听到这来势不善的声音.

sentences.en: He crept toward her with a light in his eye that was ominous.
sentences.cn: 他眼冒凶光,一步步朝她逼去.

sentences.en: He had a fall, which was ominous of his downfall.
sentences.cn: 他曾跌倒, 这是他垮台的征兆.

sentences.en: His voice, for all its lightness, had an ominous ring.
sentences.cn: 他的话音虽轻, 却含有一种不祥的腔调.

sentences.en: It was an ominous incident which foreshadowed worse things to come.
sentences.cn: 这是一场不吉利的事件,它预示着还要有更糟糕的事情发生.

sentences.en: Ominous items of news of varied credibility now began to come in.
sentences.cn: 这时,可信程度不同的各种不祥的消息开始传来了.

sentences.en: The car is making an ominous rattling sound.
sentences.cn: 汽车在发出一种不妙的咔嗒声。

sentences.en: The development of severs hypertention in glomerular disease is an ominous s ign.
sentences.cn: 肾小球疾病时发生严重高血压是一种不良的现象.

sentences.en: The hooting of an owl came over the hill -- ominous sound!
sentences.cn: 山那边传来猫头鹰的叫声 —— 不祥的声音!

sentences.en: The rolls of distant thunder were growing more ominous.
sentences.cn: 远处隆隆的雷声听着愈发惊心，要变天了。

sentences.en: There was an ominous silence at the other end of the phone.
sentences.cn: 电话那头出现了不祥的沉默。

sentences.en: There were ominous dark clouds gathering overhead.
sentences.cn: 不祥的阴霾在头顶上汇聚。

sentences.en: Those black clouds look ominous for our picnic.
sentences.cn: 那些乌云对我们的野餐来说是个不祥之兆.

sentences.en: To us Catholics the sound of the drumming was ominous and threatening.
sentences.cn: 对于我们天主教徒这鼓声则是不祥而危险的.

sentences.en: Yet, ominous images of the century still loom over me, challenging my apathy.
sentences.cn: 然而不祥的世纪形象,不肯放过我的淡漠.

trans.tran_cn: 不祥的，坏兆头的，预兆的，预示的
trans.tran_en: making you feel that something bad is going to happen
